column5: Hello OFC, heading out to Rockpoint Provincial Park on Lake Erie this weekend, and was wondering if anyones tried fishing there? I'd rather fish from the shore, unless it's a calm day and I can head around the shore in a canoe.  Thanks.
I would suggest popping into Mohawk Marina, they should be able to give you some information on whats going on.
To fish frpom shore would be futile, I would suggest going over to Port Maitland and try from there. Or has been suggested go to Mohawk Marina and rent a boat.
